name: 徐正會

1. Optimal Selection of Mechanics and Controls
2. Types of Automation Systems
3. Characteristics of Automation Systems (mechanisms)
4. Characteristics of Automation Systems (Controllers)
5. Automation Systems (Actuators)
6. Automation Mechanisms
7. Automation Actuators
8. Automation Controllers, Automation Sensors
9. Mid-term Exam.
10. Kinematic Characteristics of Specific Mechanisms
11. Operating Characteristics of Specific Mechanisms
12. Factory Automation
13. Factory Automation Case Study
14. Automation Mechanism Planning
15. Common Automation Mechanisms
16. Mechanism Conversion and Transmission
17. Walking Mechanisms
18. Final Exam.

全華圖書
